input.title: David and Goliath
input.summary: A young shepherd boy defeats a giant warrior with faith and a sling
keyMoments: David chooses stones from the stream
David defeats Goliath with a single stone

input.title: Noah's Ark
input.summary: Noah builds an ark to save his family and animals from a great flood
keyMoments: God tells Noah to build an ark
Animals enter the ark two by two
The great flood covers the earth
The dove returns with an olive branch

input.title: Jonah and the Whale
input.summary: A prophet tries to run from God but learns obedience through a great fish
